articles.author: George Yang
articles.title: How Long Will It Take To Connect All Of Australia In Death Stranding 2? - Kotaku
articles.description: It's once again time to strap some packages to your body and hit the road to make a difference
articles.content: Hideo Kojimas highly anticipated sequel to 2019s Death Stranding, Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, is out now. This journey sees the return of protagonist Sam Bridges after his journey connecting the… [+2405 chars]
